column2: "Transfer to Las Vegas confirmed. This operational area is very large. I feel tired just thinking about walking around here."
"...But don't worry. We've had something under development for just such an occasion!"
"Introducing the Rideroid! It's a high-mobility, high-speed vehicle designed to help operatives move and fight across a wide area!"
"Make good use of the Rideroid to defeat the Phantoms that appear throughout the vast cityscape of Las Vegas!"
